sentences.english: A large body of evidence has demonstrated that ethylene is the hormone of catalyzing fruit ripening.
sentences.chinese: 大量研究證實，乙烯是躍變型成熟果實的催熟劑。

sentences.english: At that time, always believe that Ma Yueqian will not be distributed knowledge, get boat.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，始終相信馬躍千里終有識，不可披髮弄扁舟。

sentences.english: Also, a climbing move in which the climber lunges or leaps to the next hold.
sentences.chinese: 也指攀登者躍向下一個支點的動作。

sentences.english: Wenfengta leaps Mt. Longshan located at Ninghai County, was constructs at the end of the Ming dynasty brick tower.
sentences.chinese: 文峯塔位於寧海縣躍龍山，是建於明末的磚塔。

sentences.english: And the young Fisherman leapt up, and left his wattled house, and ran down to the shore.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的漁夫躍然而起，衝出了他的小屋，奔向海岸。

sentences.english: From a private citizen, this man became the ruler of Syracuse.
sentences.chinese: 這個人從一個普通公民躍爲錫拉庫薩的統治者。

sentences.english: The information the teacher found strange, even offered to talk to jump alone.
sentences.chinese: 心細的文老師發現了異樣，提出要與馬躍單獨談談。

sentences.english: Su Yan jump to the children, let children feel wrong.
sentences.chinese: 蘇巖馬躍討好孩子，讓孩子感覺不對勁。

sentences.english: Eventhough I want to have something changed, I will never supass those tedious words.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼永遠也躍不過那些枯燥的言語。

sentences.english: As soon as the price picks up enquiries will revive.
sentences.chinese: 一旦價錢上升，詢盤將恢新生躍。
馬躍滿肚子的話說不出。

sentences.english: Create a circle while hopping on one foot.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲要求玩家單腳跳躍，同時，組成一個圈。
